mapper.select: /* groupCodeList */ SELECT * FROM CAM_ITEM.DJ_ITEM_CD GROUP BY GRP_SN
/* codeList */ SELECT A.* FROM CAM_ITEM.DJ_ITEM_CD A WHERE LG_CD IS NOT NULL AND ITEM_CD IS NULL
mapper.insert: /* insSetLgCode */ INSERT INTO CAM_ITEM.DJ_ITEM_CD ( GRP_SN, GRP_NM, LG_CD, LG_CD_NM ) VALUES ( #{grpSn}, #{grpNm}, #{lgCode}, #{lgCodeNm} )
mapper.select: /* smCodeList */ SELECT * FROM CAM_ITEM.DJ_ITEM_CD WHERE GRP_SN = #{grpSn} AND LG_CD = #{lgCd} AND ITEM_CD IS NOT NULL
mapper.insert: /* insItemCode */ INSERT INTO CAM_ITEM.DJ_ITEM_CD ( GRP_SN, GRP_NM, LG_CD, LG_CD_NM, ITEM_CD, ITEM_CD_NM ) VALUES ( #{grpSn}, #{grpNm}, #{lgCd}, #{lgCdNm}, #{itemCd}, #{itemCdNm} )
mapper.select: /* getItemMaster */ SELECT IM.*, WHC.ITEM_CD_NM AS WH_CD_NM, IUC.ITEM_CD_NM AS ITEM_UNIT_NM FROM CAM_ITEM.DJ_ITEM_MASTER IM JOIN CAM_ITEM.DJ_ITEM_CD WHC ON WHC.LG_CD = 'WH' AND IM.WH_CD = WHC.ITEM_CD JOIN CAM_ITEM.DJ_ITEM_CD IUC ON IUC.LG_CD = 'UNIT' AND IM.ITEM_UNIT_CD = IUC.ITEM_CD WHERE IM.MASTER_SN = #{masterSn}
/* getItemNoDuplicate */ SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END FROM CAM_ITEM.DJ_ITEM_MASTER WHERE ITEM_NO = #{itemNo}
mapper.insert: /* setItemMasterReg */ INSERT INTO CAM_ITEM.DJ_ITEM_MASTER ( ITEM_NO, ITEM_NAME, ITEM_UNIT_CD, STANDARD, WH_CD, SAFETY_INVEN, ACTIVE, REG_EMP_SEQ ) VALUES ( #{itemNo}, #{itemName}, #{itemUnitCd}, #{standard}, #{whCd}, #{safetyInven}, #{active}, #{empSeq} )
